span.strong: For information about Oklahoma’s Promise or to apply online, visit www.okpromise.org. Information is also available by

div.p:
U.S. Department of Education
Office of Inspector General Hotline
400 Maryland Avenue, S.W.
Washington D.C. 20202-1500
Fax: (202) 245-7047
